title: Ranked emblems
body: Just want some clarity, will you need to have 25 wins in each specific category to earn an emblem or is it 25 wins and it will automatically deem which one you deserve, because I'm pretty sure I've won at least 25 games since the previous patch

replies.body: you have to win 25 game in order to get it

> [{quoted}](name=5aledXninja,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bErcrTu1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-29T03:15:47.702+0000)
>
> you have to win 25 game in order to get it

Yeah I can see it now, does it show in loading at all ?
I don't know but if you go to your profile in the client the emblem will be under your current rank
